column2: we did go with the goat chili cheese fries - clearly taking a day off from the new years diet. Boyfriend also had a milkshake - really
column3: what diet? The waitress offered Whiskey and he was quick to agree that
column4: that sounded like a fantastic idea - when the bill came and the milkshake was $7 and the Whiskey was $9 he had some buyers remorse...
